products.title: Konya Blackout Porcelain White
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blalckout Porcelain White Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Porcelain White Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Konya Blackout Chalk White
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Chalk White Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost

products.title: Galaxy asc Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Galaxy asc Blackout White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX6010. A stylish, blackout pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.
products.productdescription: Part of our Galaxy Blackout range, where Advanced Solar Control (ASC) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Snow White Blackout Honeycomb Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Snow White Blackout Honeycomb Perfect Fit
products.productdescription:
The gorgeous pleated Snow White Honeycomb Blackout Perfect Fit blind is a simple yet elegant choice. Its pure white fabric offers versatile style options. It will add a modern, classy feel to any window you choose. You simply can’t go wrong with a crisp white blind.
 Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more.

products.title: Luna Blackout Cloud White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Luna Blackout Cloud White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Luna Blackout Cloud White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: ThermoBlock Blackout White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our exclusive ThermoBlock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. 
 
A whiteelectric roller blind easily brightens up the space,  and our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.   This off-white blackout roller has a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter,  a great option for hot offices or sunrooms. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more difficult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space.  Why not pair with our Smart Hub - control your blinds from the comfort of your phone while away, or pair with Amazon Alexa or Google Home Hub for a truly streamlined experience. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years' experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This white electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2138 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Silver UV-Reflecting Thermal Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.productdescription:
The subtleness of this exquisite Isla PVC Blackout Whisper White electric roller blind adds just enough pretty interest to dress up a window. In the palest white with a leafy double-sided design it’s perfect to create a light and airy space. Ideal for a soft, feminine bedroom, a bathroom or to add a delicate focal point in a kitchen, this dreamy blind is made using a blackout fabric to keep daylight out when you need to and a safe, flame retardant finish. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.

products.productdescription:
Soft, muted grey with wispy willow branches make a delicate Willow Blackout Birch White electric blackout roller blind choice for a bedroom or living area. It blends well with most neutral décor and gives a feminine yet contemporary feel to your chosen space.
